BrainSeed Networks Community

Building Success Together!

You saw the tagline, we stand by it! We aim to bring change in the society through the actions we implement, nourish every brain to have limitless power of thinking & imagnation.

Join this community to get 1:1 Mentorship, Roadmaps, participate in Hackathons, Open Source Programs and Events on various emerging technologies. But most importantly interact with "Big Brains" like yourself from all over India.

Get Started

What's in store for YOU?

COLLABORATE

“Actively seek like-minded, goal-driven people to build a network of mutually beneficial relationships.”

IN-PERSON EVENTS

“Attend in-person events organised by the community with professional speakers, mentors and experience the impact they can have on you!”

CODE

“Dedicated space for coders worldwide to collaborate on the same platform, discuss their problems and solutions, and announce the latest programming language and tool trends.”

ACCELERATE

“Maintain visibility within the community on small and large milestones at all times to keep everyone motivated.”

TARGET

“Target the goals you have and achieve them all with the support of this community in the form of guided roadmaps, mentorships, resources.”

Get Started

All about my 'Interview Experience'@BrainSeed Networks...

I'd like to mention that it was my very first interview for getting selected in the core team of a Technical Community and I can't be more grateful to the interviewers for such a smooth and light interview experience! I'd love to share my passion for communities with BrainSeed Networks!

01

Implement my Skills

Implement my Skills

I was given a "Web development" task to develop this landing page in 1.5 days for which I majorly used Tailwind Css as a framework as I've been learning this technology for quite sometime. I'm glad I got a chance to do hands-on practice via this task. I learned alot while debugging and refactoring my code.

02

Improved Confidence

Improved Communication Skills

When my interview got scheduled I was very nervous but as the interview progressed, I noticed I was able to speak-out my thoughts clearly and better. That helped me boost my confidence as an individual as well.

03

Fastrack Development

Fastrack Development

In the past I've never made a landing page for any website in less than 3 days, but this task presented me a new challenge and I am happy I took it as an opportunity to test my skills.

04

Think about the Product

Think about the Product

I've seen a handful amount of Community websites and when I got a chane to develop one myself, I was able to reflect better on the values and skills communities provides us with. I was able to think from the perspective of The BrainSeed Networks Community to provide the best product possible.
